channel.title: Meishin Muso Ryu
channel.description: Recent content on Meishin Muso Ryu

item.title: Iaido Seminar will be Sept. 15-16, 2018
item.description: We will have the 2018 Fall Meishin Muso Ryu Iaido Seminar on the weekend of Sept. 15-16, led by Shuji Matsushita Sensei.

item.title: Shudokan Kendo Godogeiko 2018
item.description: We hosted our first kendo summer godogeiko ever on Saturday, July 21. Our dojo was lucky enough to train with several high-ranking sensei and their students from several dojos.

item.title: Garden State Kendo Tournament 2018
item.description: We participated Saturday in the 2018 Garden State Kendo Tournament. Every year, this excellent tournament attracts competitors from New York to Canada.

item.title: Meishin Muso Ryu Official Website
item.description: Welcome to the official website of Meishin Muso Ryu, an Iaido style passed down from Shinkage Ryu.

item.title: Videos
item.description: Here are videos of Meishin Muso Ryu iaido demonstrations. Follow us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/MeishinMusoRyu Two Person Iai and Cutting with Matsushita Sensei and his Sempai, Fukaya Sensei 2015 Philadelphia Cherry Blossom Festival Three-Person Iaido demonstration Two-Person Iaido demonstration with Matsushita Shuji Sensei and Matsushita Katsunori Sensei 2014 Philadelphia Cherry Blossom Festival Iaido Demonstration 2012 Philadelphia Cherry Blossom Festival Iaido Demonstration

item.title: Members
item.description: Here are some of the instructors and members of Meishin Muso Ryu. Full list coming soon. Instructors Matsushita Shuji Sensei Kendo rank: 7th dan kyoshi Matsushita Katsunori Kendo rank: 5th dan Iaido rank: 5th dan Thomas Hill Kendo rank: 3rd dan Iaido rank: 4th dan Members Rajagopalan Subrahmanian Kendo rank: 3rd dan Iaido rank: 3rd dan Namsoo Kim Kendo rank: 3rd dan Eunju Choi Kendo rank: 3rd dan Michael Luckenbill Kendo rank: 1st dan Iaido rank: 2nd dan Matt Fried Iaido rank: 1st dan Pete Kraus Kendo rank: Mudansha Iaido rank: 1st dan Gary Pang Kendo rank: 1st dan Iaido rank: 2nd kyu John Ferguson Iaido rank: 2nd kyu Marcus Hawkins Iaido rank: 3rd kyu Keith Bowers Iaido rank: 3rd kyu Melissa Kestle Kendo rank: Mudansha Iaido rank: 6th kyu

item.title: Instructors
item.description: Matsushita Shuji Sensei Kendo 7th Dan kyoshi Matsushita Shuji (松下 修治) was born in 1950 on the island of Kyushu, Japan. Matsushita Sensei started practicing kendo at the age of 7. In 1974, he entered the Shinkage Ryu Integrated Budo Dojo, where he apprenticed for the next seven years in Kendo, Iaido, Taijitsu, Judo and Karate. At 31, he received a Master’s Degree in Shinkage Ryu. During this time, he left his mark in many tournaments.
